attributes.action: Against the football league and Shaun Harvey's treatment of massimo Cellino and Leeds United football club
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition is against the improper use of power against Leeds United football club and it's owner/president massimo Cellino. This is to get the government to review how the fit and proper directors and owners test. It is used and abused by the football league and Shaun Harvey to pick an choose who they approve.

Make a stand against the abuse and singling out of Leeds United football club.

Marching on together

rejection.details: This is a matter only for the Football Association.   The Government, however, does monitor the progress it is making regarding governance and compliance.
